title: What are some original ideas for a sci-fi novel? - Quora

response.answer_text: a time travel story told from the perspective of a tachyon particle An alien invasion story that really about a bacterial infection causing a zombie apocalypse A bunch of humans are trapped on a planet doomed to move slowly through space and time… one of them is a spy with a license to kill… he fights bad guys and sleeps with women An alien race develops a technology to share ideas widely through a question and answer format… some weirdo thinks this means somebody will give him free good ideas for an original novel… Everybody Laughs :)

I won’t give you the idea, I’ll give you the question that should give you an idea. “Why have the medical and biological sciences failed to keep up with computing for advancement? Is something stopping them?“ That’s it, that’s all you get. Its original as of this moment as far as I know and its only a question to be answered. I’ll give it to others if anyone asks. Because about a dozen potential sci-fi answers come to mind immediately.
